actions.text: On agreeing to the McIntosh amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 224 - 179 (Roll No. 73).

description: Amendment requires the States, in the enforcement of a Federal program, to comply with provisions that allow for the suspension of a civil fine for a first-time violation of a paperwork requirement by a small business.
purpose: An amendment to require States to waive civil penalties on small businesses in the case of first-time violations relating to failure to comply with regulatory filing requirements under federal law.
